column5: I can't believe that I've never been in there, before today, and I live about 5mins away. I popped in and had a great chat with Tom, the owner. What a great guy! The shelves are fully stocked and so are the minnow tanks for the up-coming hard water season. I'll be a regular from now on. Be sure to stop in and say hi.  Colin
230 Innisfil Street #1, Barrie, ON L4N 2N1, Canada +1 705-737-2248
Yup, great guy, always hot coffee on hand, fantastic stock in the store.  If I need something, that's where I go..  About 10mins away from the house.
I was there  last week for the first time and will definetely go back
I haven't been in since last winter.  But I will be sure to stop in and say hi again.  Good to support the little guys.
Been there a couple of times. Seems like quite a knowledgeable guy(as well as being a nice guy)
230 Innisfil Street #1, Barrie, ON L4N 2N1, Canada +1 705-737-2248 thanks for posting the address, Jose!
I'll be stopping in soon to see what they have. Just need more ice before me and the kids head out onto the ice.
Many a minnow and other stuff from him,6am works for me,allows travel time before daybreak.
Great little shop for sure! Does anyone know what his stock of Freedom jigs is like?
Bait bucket is great. But don't forget to stop in at mr and mrs Canning's  for a chuckle and some minnows at least one or twice a season.
Great little shop for sure! Does anyone know what his stock of Freedom jigs is like? He's got a good selection of them Chris.
Thanks Colin, I'll be sure to pop in tomorrow!
Didn't know about them before, will check them out this year, thanks  Maureen
